column1: Falco Chubb-Baggins was a cousin of Bilbo Baggins
column2: the son of Bilbos uncle Bingo Baggins and Chica Chubb.

column3: but not quite long enough to attend his cousins Bilbos Farewell Party
column4: which was held two years after his death. He was survived by a daughter
column6: but when she married Filibert Bolger the short-lived Chubb-Baggins Family line came to an end.

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in Bag End. One of them is Falco
column2: and one of Bilbos lines when looking at the portraits is "Ah
